definitions.definition: A person concerned with people 's welfare ; a do-gooder or philanthropist .
One who believes that Jesus Christ is fully human and not divine .
Synonym of humanist ( “ a person who believes in the philosophy of humanism ” ) .

main_definition: A person concerned with people 's welfare ; a do-gooder or philanthropist .
secondary_definitions: ( Christianity , rare ) One who believes that Jesus Christ is fully human and not divine .
( philosophy , historical ) Synonym of humanist ( “ a person who believes in the philosophy of humanism ” ) .
